title: Tax and Administration in Canada
headline: Develop an understanding of the Canadian taxation and administration system with this free online course on Alison.com.
description: Are you looking to develop an understanding of the taxation systems and laws in Canada? Or are you starting your own business in Canada and want to know the tax implications? This online course on tax and administration in Canada covers all this and much more. You will explore the history of taxation as well as analyse the tax laws relevant to the type and place of income generated. So register today to learn more!

courseDescription:
Are you an employee struggling to grasp the various tax laws that apply to your source of income? This online course on tax and administration in Canada will cover this topic and more. You will first work through a history of taxation and its evolution into the state it is today. Then we will examine the fundamental principles of taxation and the methods to determine the income stream in great detail.

Are you wondering how to compute the profits of your business that will be taxable in the current year? The course shall examine the income generated from various sources and how the authorities tax them. Whether you are an employee, business owner, shareholder or property owner, we will explore all these aspects in detail to help you understand the taxation system fully. We will also explain the value-added tax on goods and services and analyse the calculation methods.

Are you looking to expand your business locally within Canada? Whether expanding locally or internationally, you can face quite a few challenges. We will identify these challenges and discuss each as we work through the course and the tax implications of expansion during the process. Taxation is a crucial component of living in any country. A sound understanding of the taxation principles can result in efficiently paying your taxes. So enrol in this course to continue your learning journey with Alison.com.
